sentences.english: Fenghuang Dancong is produced in Fenghuang town of Chao'an county in Guangdong Province .
sentences.chinese: 鳳凰單叢產於廣東省潮安縣鳳凰鎮。

sentences.english: There are more than 10 varieties DanChong tea in her store.
sentences.chinese: 在她的店裏，有超過10種以上的單叢茶。

definition: an expensive type of oolong tea
pleasant aftertaste in the back of the throat (esp. when drinking tea)
monk fruit, the sweet fruit of Siraitia grosvenorii, a vine of the Curcubitaceae family native to southern China and northern Thailand, used in Chinese medicine
cicada slough/fig. to free oneself/to extricate oneself from
conversant with the Confucian classics/to stimulate menstrual flow (TCM)
mouth and teeth/enunciation/to articulate/diction/age (of cattle, horses etc)
to refresh and clear the mind (idiom)/invigorating/bracing
liquorice (Sophora flavescens), with roots used in TCM
